/root/.config/Duplicati/.description: Choose a Share for duplicati configuration. Eg: create a Share called duplicati-config for this purpose alone.
/root/.config/Duplicati/.label: Config Storage

/data.description: Choose a Share for duplicati content(your media). Eg: create a Share called duplicati-data for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/data.label: Data Storage

Duplicati.more_info:
Adding more media to duplicati.

You can add more Shares(with media) to duplicati from the settings wizard of this Rock-on.
